author: bigmistqke
message: chore: extract build:lexicons script

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: extract build:lexicons script

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: use ticks for musical timing in lexicon

ATProto doesn't support floats - use integer ticks instead of fractional bars.
Adds ppq (pulses per quarter note, default 960) for resolution.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: remove counter functionality from makeMonitor

Simplifies perf monitor API - counters now handled locally where needed.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: replace jam columns with fixed grid and layout regions

Columns now have uniform duration (columnCount + columnDuration).
Layouts are defined as regions spanning multiple columns (layoutRegions).
Prepares for decoupling grid UI from timing data.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: simplify perf monitor API with unified makeMonitor

- Replace createPerfMonitor/makeCounter with single makeMonitor function
- Monitor wraps functions with timing: monitor('label', fn)
- Counters integrated: monitor.count('label', amount)
- Stats accessible via monitor.getAllStats(), monitor.getCounters()
- Add typed generics for label constraints
- Add __ENABLE_PERF__ build flag for tree-shaking in production
- Remove legacy global perf state in favor of instance-based state

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: merge column header and timeline into single button

Clicking a column button now both selects it for editing and seeks
the playhead to that position. Removes redundant header row.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: restructure sequencer with scrollable tracks and fixed ruler

- Split into header row, scrollable tracks container, and ruler row
- Tracks overflow vertically while ruler stays fixed at bottom
- Column highlighting extends through all sections
- Added spacer and filler rows for continuous column backgrounds

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: make preview a draggable overlay

Preview is now a floating overlay that can be repositioned by dragging.
Includes drag handle with column info display.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: convert layout sidebar to horizontal action bar

Replaces vertical sidebar with compact horizontal bar showing duration
inputs, layout selector, and column actions. Removes orientation-based
responsive layout.

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: auto-sync layouts based on track clip count

Layouts are now determined by how many tracks have clips in a column:
- 1 track: full
- 2 tracks: pip, h-split, v-split
- 3 tracks: 3-up
- 4 tracks: 2x2

Slots are auto-assigned based on track order. Removes manual slot
assignment UI and simplifies the layout editor.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: use subgrid for sequencer column backgrounds

- Add column wrapper with subgrid to inherit row alignment
- Highlight current column via wrapper background instead of cell styling
- Increase row gap for better visual separation
- Fix off-center slot numbers by adding padding to balance margins
- Remove dimmed styling for clips not in visible slots
- Clean up unused CSS (timelineRuler, z-index, current variants)

author: bigmistqke
message: feat: add duplicate column and improve layout

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: colocate jam UI components

- Merge Cell, ColumnHeader, TrackLabel, TimelineRuler into Grid.tsx
- Merge LayoutPreview, LayoutSelector, SlotAssigner into LayoutEditor.tsx
- Consolidate CSS modules with section headers
- Simplify index.ts exports

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add video preview with compositor and timeline ruler

- Add Preview component using makeVideoCompositor and makeVideoPlayback
- Load test videos via UrlSource from mediabunny
- Use track.id as clipId for 1-stem-per-track model
- Add timeline ruler row for column-based seeking

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: improve jam sequencer UX

- Increased column gap for clearer clip boundaries
- Added trackVideos store with 4 test video URLs
- Dimmed styling for clips not in visible slots
- Slot number indicator on visible clips

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: improve clip painting and visual styling

Painting now extends clips instead of creating separate ones per cell.
Connected cells have no gaps and bigger border radius for clip ends.

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add jam package with grid-based video sequencer

Grid-based UI for sequencing video clips through changing layouts.
Includes sequencer grid, layout editor, and clip span visualization.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: revert library packages to src entries, remove tsup build

All packages except lexicons now use ./src/index.ts directly.
No build step required - Vite handles transpilation at dev/build time.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: extract makeVideoRenderer and makeVideoCompositor from compositor worker

- makeVideoRenderer: WebGL layer (textures, shaders, rendering)
- makeVideoCompositor: orchestration (frames, timeline, effects)
- compositor.worker.ts reduced to thin RPC wrapper

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: extract @eddy/solid package with shared SolidJS primitives

- Create @eddy/solid package with action, resource, deep-resource, create-resource-map, create-clock
- action: async actions with abort/cleanup, phased actions
- resource: enhanced createResource with proper cleanup
- deep-resource: resource + store reconciliation
- create-resource-map: reactive map of resources
- create-clock: clock for time management
- Update packages/app to import from @eddy/solid

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: extract @eddy/timeline package with nested group support

- Create @eddy/timeline package with compileLayoutTimeline, findSegmentAtTime, getActivePlacements
- Add recursive compilation for nested groups (clips can reference groups for layout transitions)
- Add TimeWindow constraint to clip inner content to parent clip duration
- Update packages/app to import from @eddy/timeline
- Remove old compile-layout-timeline.ts from packages/app
- 18 tests passing including layout transition test case

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: convert library packages from vite to tsup

Faster builds with esbuild. Audio worklet uses noExternal to bundle deps.

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: bundle AudioWorklet as separate entry for library builds

Build ring-buffer-processor as separate entry with deps bundled inline.
Use runtime new URL() pattern to resolve worklet path.

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: implement pipeline branching with weighted outputs

Add pipeline types with weighted output arrays for parallel signal routing.
Audio uses GainNodes for weighted routing, video compiles branches to single shader.

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: enable sourcemaps for library packages

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add curve lexicon validators and mutable types

- Add curveValidators and curveWireValidators for curve data
- Export CurveKeyframe, CurveEnvelope, CurveLfo, Curve types
- Add Mutable utility type for solid-js store usage
- Export MutableProject, MutableTrack, MutableClip, MutableGroup

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: update dependencies

author: bigmistqke
message: refactor: split project lexicon into separate domain files

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: add local dependency overrides

author: bigmistqke
message: refactor: move static value definitions to app.eddy.values lexicon

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: split effect lexicons into separate files

- Extract audio effects to app.eddy.audioEffect.ts
- Extract visual effects to app.eddy.visualEffect.ts
- Update index.ts with cross-lexicon ref resolution
- Reduces app.eddy.project.ts from 921 to 644 lines

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add staticBlendMode and customParams types for consistent effect params

- Add staticBlendMode type with { value: 'normal' | ... } pattern
- Add customParams as empty object for extensible custom effects
- Update blendMode in visualEffect.opacity to use staticBlendMode ref
- Update visualEffect.custom.params to use customParams ref
- Update Track.tsx to use VisualEffect from lexicons

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: simplify effect rendering with onBeforeRender callback

- Replace effectValues/effectParamRefs arrays with onBeforeRender callback
- Pre-compute effect keys in EffectRef to avoid hot-path string concatenation
- Move EffectParamRef type from @eddy/video to compile-layout-timeline
- Move injectPreviewClip utilities to make-player.ts where used
- Extract PREVIEW_CLIP_ID to constants.ts
- Remove unused timeline query functions (getPlacementsInRange, getNextTransition)

author: bigmistqke
message: feat: add UI for colorize effect with vector param support

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: implement multi-param effects with pre-computed paramRefs

- Add params Record pattern to lexicons with separate defs per effect
- Add vec3/vec4 types for vector effect params (colorize)
- Change effect controls to use paramKey directly (value(), color(), intensity())
- Add colorize effect with color (vec3) and intensity (scalar) params
- Pre-compute effectParamRefs at timeline compile time (perf optimization)
- Update compositor to use pre-computed refs instead of per-frame allocation

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: implement audio cascade with root group as master

- Add audioPipeline to Group schema, rename pipeline → videoPipeline
- Remove masterAudioPipeline/masterVideoPipeline from project (root group serves as master)
- Modify makeAudioBus to accept optional destination for hierarchy chaining
- Add group audio buses in player with track → group → parent group routing
- Add setMasterVolume/getMasterVolume/setMasterPan via root group's audio bus
- Add useMediaStreamOutput/useDirectOutput to AudioBus for recording
- Delete getMasterMixer singleton - functionality moved to root group
- Update default project with gain effect on root group

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: pre-compute effectKeys in timeline compiler

Avoids redundant mapping on hot render path. Placement now includes
effectKeys array and effectId (renamed from effectSignature).

author: bigmistqke
message: refactor: consolidate effect-registry into effect-manager and simplify EffectInstance to string

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: separate video effects into effects, effect-registry, and effect-manager directories

Explicit registry injection replaces global registry. Effects are pure factories,
registry and manager take registry as parameter.

author: bigmistqke
message:
chore: use published view.gl package

Switch from local link to npm @bigmistqke/view.gl@0.1.12.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: remove initialValues from effect types

Values are set via setEffectValue() before each render, making
initialValues redundant. Also renamed compose-effects to compile-effect-program.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: separate effect manager from compositor

Effect chain compilation now handled by makeEffectManager(gl), keeping
makeVideoCompositor focused on texture rendering. Worker wires them together.

author: bigmistqke
message:
chore: minor cleanups in video effects code

- Remove glsl tag from no-effects comment string
- Remove redundant section header comment
- Simplify code comment

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: link view.gl to local package for development

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: register video effects only in compositor worker

Removes video effect registration from main thread to prevent
dual view.gl instances causing symbol alias mismatches.

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: implement video effect deduplication with array uniforms

Enables same effect type used multiple times in a chain to share
a single GLSL function with indexed array access (WebGL2).

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: integrate cascading video effects into compiled timeline

- Add EffectRef type for referencing effect values by source coordinates
- Extend Placement with effectSignature (for shader caching) and effectRefs
- Collect cascaded effects during timeline compilation (clip → track → group... → master)
- Replace track-based effect API with setEffectValue(sourceType, sourceId, effectIndex, value)
- Cache shader programs by effectSignature, compile lazily on first use
- Resolve effect values from refs at render time

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: move effect symbols to module scope for stable shader identities

- Move Symbol declarations outside factory functions so all effect
  instances share the same Symbol (fixes multi-track effect bug)
- Store effect values in array, set uniforms at render time
- Remove unused make-effect-chain-cache.ts
- Add activateEffectChain method to compositor
- Enhanced debug logging

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: activate program before setting initial effect uniform values

WebGL requires gl.useProgram() to be called before setting uniforms.
Without this, initial effect values were silently ignored.

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: wire video effect pipeline from UI to compositor

- Add video effect registry with brightness, contrast, saturation
- Add videoPipeline to track data model in lexicon
- Generate video effect sliders dynamically from pipeline
- Compositor worker registers/updates effect chains per track
- Comment out curveRef for now (simplify to static values only)

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: integrate video effect chains into compositor

- Add VideoEffectChain, CompiledEffectChain types
- Add makeEffectChainCache for caching compiled shaders
- Compositor now manages effect chains by id
- Placements can reference effectChainId (passthrough default)
- Each unique chain compiles to one shader, no framebuffers needed

author: bigmistqke
message:
chore: clean up unused exports, dependencies, and files

- Simplify atproto imports to use main export instead of subpaths
- Remove unused subpath exports from atproto package.json
- Remove unused deps: @bigmistqke/rpc from audio, @bigmistqke/view.gl from utils
- Delete unused files: app/src/utils.ts, scripts/seed-deciduous.ts

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: rename create-player to make-player

Player is a factory function that creates instances, not a reactive hook.
Align with make-* naming convention for factory functions.

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: update auth imports after context relocation

Update imports to point to new auth locations after moving auth-context
from @eddy/atproto to app components. Remove solid-js deps from atproto
package since it no longer contains SolidJS code.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: move auth context from @eddy/atproto to app components

Auth context is SolidJS-specific UI code that belongs in the app, not
the atproto package which should remain framework-agnostic.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: rename create-* to make-* in video, media, and utils packages

Continue naming convention alignment across remaining packages:
- @eddy/video: compositor, decoder, playback → make-video-*
- @eddy/media: demuxer, muxer → make-demuxer, make-muxer
- @eddy/utils: loop → make-loop, perf → make-perf-monitor
- @eddy/utils: extract debug and guards to separate modules
- Update all import paths in workers and primitives

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: rename create-* to make-* in @eddy/audio package

Align audio package with naming convention established in app primitives:
- audio-elements → audio-element-registry
- create-audio-bus → make-audio-bus
- create-audio-playback → make-audio-playback
- create-effect-chain → make-effect-chain
- audio-decoder → make-audio-decoder
- ring-buffer → audio-ring-buffer
- scheduler → make-audio-scheduler
- offline-audio-mixer → make-offline-audio-mixer

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: consolidate layout-types into compile-layout-timeline

Move all types from layout-types.ts directly into compile-layout-timeline.ts
since they're only used by this module and its consumers. Reduces file count
and keeps related code together.

author: bigmistqke
message:
docs: expand decision graph workflow in CLAUDE.md

- Add detailed behavioral triggers table
- Document verbatim prompt capture requirements
- Add connection maintenance guidelines
- Include quick commands reference
- Add branch-based grouping and audit checklist
- Document session lifecycle and autonomy rules

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: reorganize app modules and extract atproto package

- Extract ATProto auth/crud to @eddy/atproto package
- Move hooks/ and lib/ modules to primitives/ directory
- Move opfs utilities to dedicated opfs/ directory
- Rename create-* to make-* for factory functions (ahead-scheduler,
  debug-info, playback, scheduler, worker-pool, opfs-source)
- Rename timeline-compiler to compile-layout-timeline
- Update all import paths across components, workers, and routes

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: replace handoff mechanism with ahead-scheduler abstraction

- Extract scheduling logic into createAheadScheduler module
- Reduce SCHEDULE_AHEAD from 2.0s to 0.5s
- Use modulo for schedule time calculation when looping
- Remove nextPlayback/nextPlaybackReady from ClipEntry
- Simplify player code by delegating to scheduler

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: use discriminated union state machine in video/playback modules

- create-video-playback.ts: Add PlaybackStateMachine, LoadedResources,
  isLoaded() guard, createPlaybackTiming(), createFrameBuffer()
- create-playback.ts: Add PlaybackStateMachine, LoadedResources,
  isLoaded() guard, transition functions for state changes

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: use discriminated union state machine in create-audio-playback

- Add PlaybackStateMachine type with idle/loading/ready/playing/paused/seeking states
- Extract LoadedResources interface for states with loaded audio
- Add isLoaded() type guard for state narrowing
- Extract createPlaybackTiming() and createAudioBuffer() as separate factories
- Add transition functions for state changes
- Enable decoder reuse via PreservedDecoder

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: stream ATProto stems directly to OPFS

- Add streamStemToOPFS() that pipes fetch response to OPFS writable stream
- Add getPdsUrl() helper that works with both CredentialSession and OAuthSession
- Update stemClips resourceMap to use streaming instead of blob + writeBlob
- Avoids loading entire blob into JS heap memory

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add OPFS storage for clips to eliminate memory overhead

- Add OPFS module (paths, write, create-opfs-source)
- Muxer writes to OPFS after finalize instead of returning blob
- Playback workers read from OPFS via BlobSource (allows concurrent reads)
- Player loadClip accepts clipId instead of blob
- stemClips resourceMap writes fetched blobs to OPFS
- Remove in-memory buffer storage from ClipEntry

author: bigmistqke
message:
docs: add diagonjs-powered architecture diagram generation

Use diagonjs to generate properly aligned ASCII diagrams from DSL input.
Edit docs/architecture-source.md with diagon blocks, then render with
node scripts/render-architecture.ts.

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: sync deciduous graph

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: remove perf monitoring and reorganize utils

Remove createPerfMonitor from playback engines and player.
Split utils into focused modules: debug.ts, guards.ts.
Use resolve queue instead of single promise for audio decode.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: consolidate tsconfigs and clean up package dependencies

Package tsconfigs now extend root config, reducing duplication.
Update @bigmistqke/rpc to ^0.1.3, remove unused vite/view.gl deps.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: split pipeline.ts into focused modules

- audio-elements.ts: element registry and factories
- create-effect-chain.ts: low-level effect node builder
- create-audio-bus.ts: high-level live audio routing
- Rename: BuiltPipeline → EffectChain, AudioPipeline → AudioBus

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: record from offset with clip layering support

- Capture timeline offset when recording starts
- Append new clips to array (later clips = higher priority)
- Start playback from current position, not always 0
- Mute track during recording to silence existing clips

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: punch-through clip behavior (top clip replaces underlying)

When clips overlap within a track, only the top clip (last in array)
plays. Earlier clips are silenced/hidden during overlap, then resume.
This enables recording over existing clips from an offset.

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: stop audio playback when clip ends

Add onEnd callback to audio playback engine that fires when media
reaches its duration. Worker handles this by stopping the scheduling
loop and setting ring buffer to not playing, preventing the last
audio chunk from repeating.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: reorganize into domain-based packages (audio, video, media)

- Create @eddy/media: demuxer, muxer (shared media types)
- Create @eddy/audio: decoder, mixer, ring buffer, scheduler, playback
- Create @eddy/video: decoder, frame utils, compositor, playback
- Remove @eddy/codecs, @eddy/compositor, @eddy/mixer, @eddy/playback
- Update all app imports to use new package structure

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: separate video/audio playback with ring buffer scheduling

- Split playback.worker into playback.video.worker and playback.audio.worker
- Add ring buffer + AudioWorklet for lock-free audio streaming
- Add pending queue scheduling in audio worker (matches working ca079e8 approach)
- Fix createLoop to use setInterval in workers (requestAnimationFrame unavailable)
- Set shared AudioContext to 48000Hz for video recording compatibility
- Move playback orchestration to app package

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add video export with offline rendering

- Add phased action pattern for multi-phase async operations
- Implement frame-by-frame export with getFrameAtTime()
- Fix localTime calculation for clips spanning segment boundaries
- Add strict mode to findFrameData for accurate export timing
- Create offline audio mixer for proper audio rendering
- Add export button with progress indicator

author: bigmistqke
message:
perf: return sync from decode() when frame already available

decode() now returns DecodeResult | Promise<DecodeResult>:
- If frame is already in pendingFrames buffer, return sync (no Promise)
- If waiting for decoder output, return Promise
- Caller checks instanceof Promise and only awaits when necessary

Reduces Promise overhead in hot path when decoder is keeping up.

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: prevent stuck frame bug with createLoop utility

Add createLoop utility that encapsulates requestAnimationFrame loop
management with proper cleanup. Fixes sporadic bug where clips would
get stuck at first frame because stale animationFrameId prevented
stream loop from restarting.

- createLoop returns { isRunning, start(), stop() }
- Callback receives loop instance for self-termination
- Refactor createPlayback and createPlayer to use createLoop

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: remove redundant reset() after decoder reuse refactor

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: reuse decoder when loading clips with matching config

Adds reset() method that flushes decoder but keeps it alive.
On load(), compares VideoDecoderConfig - if codec/width/height match,
skips decoder initialization (~50-200ms savings on subsequent clips).

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: make createWorkerPool generic with factory functions

Worker pool no longer imports PlaybackWorker directly. Caller provides:
- create: factory to instantiate Worker
- wrap: factory to wrap with RPC
- reset: cleanup function on release

This decouples the pool from specific worker types.

author: bigmistqke
message: feat: add decoder queue backpressure to skip delta frames when overloaded

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: extract worker logic to @eddy/playback and @eddy/compositor

- Replace stale @eddy/playback with new implementation:
  - PlaybackEngine class for video playback lifecycle
  - Frame utilities (alignUp, calculateAlignedLayout, frameToData, dataToFrame)

- Replace stale @eddy/compositor with new implementation:
  - CompositorEngine class for WebGL video frame rendering

- Refactor workers to thin RPC wrappers:
  - demux.worker.ts: 264 → 101 lines (uses @eddy/codecs)
  - playback.worker.ts: 861 → 167 lines (uses @eddy/playback)
  - compositor.worker.ts: 464 → 340 lines (uses @eddy/compositor)

- Update debug.tsx to handle missing playback module gracefully

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: add loop perf test to workflow docs

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add time input to transport bar for scrubbing

Shows current time / duration in MM:SS.ms format.
Click and edit to seek to a specific time.

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: preview rendering with segment-based timeline

Injects synthetic 'preview' clip into timeline when track is in preview mode.
Compositor uses unified render loop for both playback and preview frames.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: clip-based playback with worker pool

- Add WorkerPool for reusing playback workers across clips
- Change player from track-centric to clip-centric (TrackEntry → ClipEntry)
- Frames now tagged with clipId, mapped to trackId in compositor
- Add hasClipForTrack/isLoadingForTrack for track-based queries

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add perf instrumentation to playback workers

- Add perf marks for decode, demux, bufferAhead, transferFrame
- Add getPerf() and resetPerf() RPC methods to workers
- Add loadTestClip() method to editor for perf testing
- Expose editor via __EDDY_DEBUG__ for automated testing
- Improve perf-test.ts with proper editor integration and status checks

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: SolidJS store mutation bug and type errors

- Fix track state not updating due to direct object mutation
  instead of using setTracks() (SolidJS stores are proxies)
- Fix connectToCompositor argument order (trackId, port)
- Fix Timeline -> LayoutTimeline type import
- Add getAllPerf() to collect stats from workers

author: bigmistqke
message: chore: add deciduous decision graph workflow

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: clean up player and worker code

- Rename renderCapture to renderToCaptureCanvas for clarity
- Refactor getOrCreateTrack for early return pattern
- Use object store pattern for tracks instead of Map
- Minor formatting and type improvements across workers

author: bigmistqke
message: refactor: remove redundant recording.worker.ts

author: bigmistqke
message: refactor: bikeshedding

author: bigmistqke
message: refactor: replace Map+versionTrack-signal with store

author: bigmistqke
message: refactor: bikeshed workers

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: show initial frame after loading clip

Seek to current time after loadClip completes so the first
frame is displayed immediately instead of waiting for play.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: use playback workers in player instead of slots

- Replace slot-based playback with per-track playback workers
- Connect workers to compositor via MessageChannel for direct frame transfer
- Track state with trackVersion signal for reactive hasClip/isLoading
- Wait for loading tracks before starting playback
- Add audio pipeline per track entry

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add playback worker for demux/decode with frame streaming

- Single worker per track handles demux + decode
- Streams VideoFrames directly to compositor via MessagePort
- Uses ring buffer with raw ArrayBuffer to avoid stale frames
- Implements play/pause/seek with buffering ahead
- Enhanced debug logging for decoder diagnostics

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: add worker-to-worker frame transfer to compositor

- Add connectPlaybackWorker/disconnectPlaybackWorker methods
- Use expose() with MessagePort for direct frame transfer from playback workers
- Remove create-slot.ts (replaced by playback workers)
- Simplify create-debug-info.ts to use player state accessors

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: resolve type errors in playback and deep-resource

- Export StoreAccessor interface from deep-resource.ts
- Add @types/audioworklet to app tsconfig
- Fix type-only import in audio-scheduler.ts

author: bigmistqke
message:
style: move track controls next to sliders to prevent layout shift

- Controls now always reserve space (hidden when no clip)
- Buttons stacked vertically next to vol/pan sliders

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: render Editor UI from project data (Ticket 5)

- Use trackId strings instead of numeric indices throughout editor
- Iterate project.tracks directly with Index for reactive updates
- Dynamic CSS grid columns/rows from group.layout
- Preserve all tracks when publishing (even empty ones)
- Fail explicitly if clip has no local blob and no remote source
- Track component accepts trackId + displayIndex props

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: don't re-upload remote stems when publishing

- Skip clips with existing stem source in publishAction
- Only add local recordings to clipBlobs for upload
- Fix layout-resolver type error ('stem' → 'clip')

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: simplify SegmentSource to single clip type

Remove stem/local distinction - blob storage location is an
implementation detail handled by getClipBlob(), not a concern
of the timeline/rendering layer.

SegmentSource is now: clip | timeline (for nested groups)

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: refactor compositor to use layout timeline (Ticket 3)

- Add setTimeline() to compositor, remove setGrid()
- Change setFrame/setPreviewStream to use trackId instead of index
- render(time) queries timeline for active segments
- Dynamic texture pool keyed by trackId
- Add viewport to LayoutSlot for preview rendering without clips
- Add SegmentSourceLocal for local recordings not yet uploaded
- Update player to accept project accessor and compile timeline
- Update slot/editor to use trackId-based API
- Always include all tracks in timeline (even without clips)

author: bigmistqke
message:
test: add layout-resolver tests

- Add vitest to app package
- Add vitest.config.ts with path aliases
- Add comprehensive tests for layout-resolver:
  - compileLayoutTimeline (grid, stacked, void members, rootGroup)
  - getActiveSegments (timing, localTime calculation)
  - getSegmentsInRange (overlapping segments)
  - getNextTransition (start/end transitions)
  - Multiple clips per track

author: bigmistqke
message:
feat: add layout resolver (Ticket 2)

Compiles hierarchical Project data into flat LayoutTimeline for compositor.

- layout-types.ts: LayoutTimeline, LayoutSlot, LayoutSegment, Viewport types
- layout-resolver.ts: compileLayoutTimeline() and query helpers
  - getActiveSegments(time) - segments active at given time
  - getSegmentsInRange(start, end) - for pre-buffering
  - getNextTransition(time) - next start/end event

Supports grid layout, stacked layout, void members, rootGroup selection.

author: bigmistqke
message:
chore: add root tsconfig.json and pnpm types script

- Add root tsconfig.json with shared compiler options
- All package tsconfigs now extend from root
- Add missing tsconfigs for utils, mixer, compositor
- Add "types": "pnpm -r types" script to root package.json
- Update CLAUDE.md with TypeScript check workflow

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: prevent AudioContext from being closed when using shared context

The audio scheduler was incorrectly closing the AudioContext when
destroy() was called, even when the context was obtained from the
destination's context property (e.g., audioPipeline.gain.context).

Simplified by removing redundant audioContext option - now just use
destination.context if destination is provided, otherwise create own.

Fixes InvalidStateError when switching projects while playing.

author: bigmistqke
message:
refactor: update lexicons for data-driven timeline architecture

- Add rootGroup field to project (references timeline root group)
- Add clipSource.stem and clipSource.group union types
- Change clip.stem to clip.source union for nested compositions
- Update crud.ts and create-editor.ts to use new source field
- Add REFACTOR_PLAN.md with full architecture design

Part of Ticket 1 from the refactor plan.

author: bigmistqke

- Remove outdated DESIGN.md and MVP.md (content moved to ARCHITECTURE.md)

author: bigmistqke
message:
fix: audio quality degradation when recording while playing back

Symptoms: Recording while simultaneously playing back previous clips caused
subsequent recordings to have thin audio with phasing-like artifacts that
faded in and out. First recording always sounded fine.

Root cause: Chrome has a known bug where audio routed to AudioContext.destination
interferes with getUserMedia capture, even when echoCancellation is enabled.
The exact mechanism is unclear, but appears related to Chrome's browser-wide
audio processing pipeline.

Fix: Route playback audio through MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode → HTMLAudioElement
instead of AudioContext.destination during recording. This bypasses the internal
audio processing conflict.

References:
- https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/g/chromium-discuss/c/6s2EnqdBERE
- https://dev.to/focused_dot_io/echo-cancellation-with-web-audio-api-and-chromium-1f8m

Additional fixes included:
- Session-based capture in worker to prevent race conditions
- Proper handling of interleaved vs planar audio formats
- Use planar format for AudioData in muxer (f32-planar)
